author: Reuters Editorial
title: France: objectives met in Syria, Macron's Russia trip still on
text:
PARIS, April 14 (Reuters) - The objectives of international strikes on Syria have been met and there are no further strikes planned at this stage but the Syrian government should be aware that fresh strikes could be planned if it crosses red lines again, France said on Saturday.
Foreign Minister Jean-Yves Le Drian told BFM TV in an interview that there were no changes to President Emmanuel Macronâ€™s planned trip to Russia next month. (Reporting by Ingrid Melander; editing by John Irish)
